derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Latin indigena 'a native' (see indigene) + -ous

entry.tran: 当地的;本土的;土生土长的
entry.def: Indigenous people or things belong to the country in which they are found, rather than coming there or being brought there from another country.
